```{r}
base_url <- "https://www.googleapis.com/youtube/v3/search"

  req_url_query(key = "AIzaSyA4Wsi18Ia6cYUZeX3NPxXhx3A3-lqXTBI") |>
  req_perform() -> resp

resp |>
  resp_body_json() -> ex1
```

```{r}
base_url <- "https://www.googleapis.com/youtube/v3/search"
channlid <- function(x) {
  request(base_url) |>
    req_url_query(key = "AIzaSyAhmTenXlu7rZAF_vvLce-2Y8Wt3srRdSI",
                  part = "snippet",
                  q = x) |>
    req_perform() |>
    resp_body_json() -> x
    assign("x", x[["items"]][[1]][["snippet"]][["channelId"]], envir = .GlobalEnv)
}
```

```{r}
for (x in a_vector) {
  channlid(x) -> y
  mylist[x] <- y
} 
```


```{r}
btomic_vector <- list2$my_list
```
